original_text: Then he cried in my ears with a loud voice, saying, “Bring near the executioners of the city, each with his destroying weapon in his hand.”
korean_text: 또 그가 큰 소리로 내 귀에 외쳐 이르시되 이 성읍을 관할하는 자들이 각기 죽이는 무기를 손에 들고 나아오게 하라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Then he cried in my ears with a loud voice,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그가 내 귀에 큰 소리로 외치며,

sentences.original_text: “Bring near the executioners of the city,
each with his destroying weapon in his hand.”
sentences.korean_translation: 각자 손에 파괴하는 무기를 든 채로.”
